text: Fredrik "Fidde" Andersson (born 18 January 1971) is a retired Swedish football defender who spent most of his career with Halmstads BK. Andersson made around 500 appearances for Halmstads BK, helping them win the 1997 and 2000 Allsvenskan titles, as well as the 1994–95 Svenska Cupen. He appeared twice for the Sweden U21 team, and once for the Sweden B team. == Honours == === Club === Halmstads BK * Allsvenskan: 1997, 2000 * Svenska Cupen: 1994–95 === Individual === * HP:s Dribbler: 1996 ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Halmstads BK players Category:Association football defenders Category:Allsvenskan players
title: Fredrik Andersson (footballer, born 1971)
